trends: There have been no other sightings in London Edgware
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Pictures of possible UFO high in sky London, June 23, 2009.
divs: Sighting Details***I have cropped the images on all but one of the object I saw. The one large file is just an original .tiff file from the bunch.*** I have been watching the Skies for a good couple of years at ciggie breaks and lunchtimes, and when ever I have a cigarette in the garden at home. I am about 10-15 miles approx from Heathrow airport and the sky above me is a pretty busy place most of the time. Tonight though I was in the garden have a smoke looking at the sky as I always do, and I got a glint of something shiny high up in the sky. I thought could this be it my first UFO? I watched and this glinting seemed very strange but so so far away I didn't know what it could be. I watched for about a 2 minutes and it remained in the same place. Visual explanation of what I was looking at is not easy, just was not anything normal. I decided to take a chance and run for the camera, I took about 4 .jpg files and 9.tiff files. Just holding down the shutter. I decided at this point to grab the binoculars as they were only 10 feet away in the kitchen, I ran for them, and in that matter of seconds it was gone! leaving me very disappointed that I had not seen it closer up, but very happy that for me I believe I was looking at something not from this world .. possibly.
